src:
侍・鈴木が３安打４打点の大暴れ　先制の適時三塁打、豪快アーチ、ダメ押しタイムリー

07 Nov 2019

　「プレミア１２・１次ラウンド、日本－台湾」（７日、台中インターコンチネンタル野球場）
　侍ジャパンの４番・鈴木誠也外野手（広島）が豪快アーチを含む、４打点の大暴れだ。
　完全アウェーの一戦で、主砲のバットが火を吹いた。一回、２死一塁では左中間へ先制の適時三塁打。三回には２死一塁で豪快に振り抜いた打球は逆風を切り裂き、左中間席中段に届く２戦連発の２ラン。滞空時間の長い一撃で、圧巻のパワーを見せつけた。
　九回にも弾丸ライナーでの左前適時打。この日４打点目となる一打で、ダメ押しした。
text:
侍 ・ Suzuki rampage 3 hits 4 hits timely timely triple strikes, exciting arches, timeless push

07 Nov 2019

"Premier 12.1 Round, Japan-Taiwan" (7th, Taichung Intercontinental Baseball Stadium)
侍 SAMURAI JAPAN No. 4 Seiya Suzuki outfielder (Hiroshima) is a four-point raging rampage including a gorgeous arch.
The main gun bat fired in a complete away game. Once in the 2nd and 1st place, the first strike to the middle left in a timely manner. In three rounds, the batting ball that was shaken out vigorously with 2 deaths cut through the headwind and reached 2 runs of 2 races that reached the middle of the left middle seat. With a long blow of airtime, he showed off the power of the masterpiece.
-9 times in front of the left with a bullet liner. On the same day, it was a bad hit with a single hit that would be the fourth RBI.
